metadata.titel_preek: Mrs. Hamer, Mrs. Durr, Brother Will, and the Word of Faith

locutie.beschrijving: The sermon explores the distinction between 'righteousness by law' and 'righteousness by faith' through the lens of the Civil Rights movement and contemporary church life.
locutie.exegetische_kwaliteit: High. The preacher accurately handles the Pauline tension between the indicative of grace and the failure of self-righteousness.

illocutie.beschrijving: The primary force is ASSERTING the nature of the gospel, though it moves toward COMMISSIVE in the final section.
voorbeelden: The word of faith which she preached was anchored by her radical understanding of the work of Christ.
Christ is the end of the law.

perlocutie.beoogd_effect: To humble the graduates from self-righteousness and ground their authority in the external Word of Christ.
perlocutie.pneumatologisch_bewustzijn: Implicit. The Spirit is not explicitly invoked as the agent of the word's efficacy.

voorbeelden: Virginia Durr was born into privilege.
The Episcopal Church is presently in danger of a new kind of legalistic sentimentality.
Listen again to the King James Version.
Picture Will Campbell, Sam Bowers, and Kenneth Dean.
I believe I admire her the most.
I offer congratulations and thanksgivings with all my heart.
There is no power in heaven or earth that can wrest the righteousness of Christ away from a sinner whom he loves.
He bestows his riches upon all who call upon him.
commissieven.kwaliteit: Strong theological content but often framed as a description of a promise rather than the act of promising itself.

voorbeelden: The dispatch from the Commander passes now to you.
declaratieven.autoriteit: The preacher claims authority on behalf of the Word, but rarely uses first-person performative verbs like 'I forgive you' or 'I declare to you'.

indicatoren: Theological analysis of the 'Protestant emphasis' as a concept.
Third-person descriptions of what Paul says.
constatief_surplus_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: The hearer is educated and inspired by examples, but not necessarily directly 'hit' by the Word as an event until the very end.

missende_elementen: Direct application of the promise to the specific graduates in the room (until the conclusion).
performatief_deficit_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: The hearer remains an observer of a 'great case' rather than a participant in a 'divine trial'.

toezegging_check.kwaliteit_toezeggen: Theologically precise but often descriptive (talking about grace) rather than executive (bestowing grace).
voorbeelden: The unconquerable righteousness of Jesus Christ, given in his death for the ungodly.

eerste_persoon.gebruik: Used for personal anecdotes and literary recommendations.

tweede_persoon.gebruik: Direct address to the graduates, especially regarding their future ministry.
tweede_persoon.performatieve_context: Used to confer the 'dispatch' at the end.

derde_persoon.gebruik: Dominant mode; discussing historical figures and theological categories.
derde_persoon.distantie_effect: Creates a lecture-like atmosphere for the first two-thirds.

verleden_tijd.gebruik: Civil Rights history and biblical exegesis.

tijdloos_present.gebruik: Theological definitions of grace and law.

actueel_present.gebruik: The 'now' of the commencement and the passing of the dispatch.

foutief_patroon.beschrijving: The sermon avoids moralism; it does not move from Assertive to Directive without grace.

sacramenteel_patroon.beschrijving: Moves from the Assertive (History/Theology) to the Commissive (The Promise of Christ's righteousness) to the Directive (Go and preach).
voorbeelden: The foundation... is the knowledge that not one of us can claim a righteousness of our own... The dispatch from the Commander passes now to you.
sacramenteel_patroon.kwaliteit: Strong theological grounding, but the 'Declarative' transition is subtle.

voorbeelden_goede_verhouding: Because you have been called... the dispatch passes to you.

diagnostische_evaluatie.diagnose_toelichting: The sermon is a masterful theological exposition of the Gospel, but it functions more as a 'testimony about the Word' than the 'Word as an event' until the final paragraphs.

sterke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: Christ is the end of the law.

zwakke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: Long sections on Virginia Durr and book reviews.

diagnostische_evaluatie.gebeuren_toelichting: The conclusion elevates the sermon to an event by 'passing the dispatch,' but the journey there is highly informative/constative.
diagnostische_evaluatie.sacramentele_toelichting: It talks about the means of grace (Eucharist/Word) more than it functions as one directly.

openbaringsleer.prediker_als_mandataris: Yes, explicitly stated: 'The dispatch... passes now to you.'
tekstueel_bewijs: God puts his words on the lips of human beings.

pneumatologie.perlocutie_theologie: Implicitly left to the Word's own power.

sacramentstheologie.preek_als_genademiddel: Yes, the sermon is seen as the 'preaching of Christ' which creates faith.
sacramentstheologie.epifanisch_taalgebruik: Strong in the Will Campbell swamp imagery.
tekstueel_bewijs: Faith comes from what is heard.

aanbevelingen.werkwoord_audit_samenvatting: Too many 'is' and 'was' verbs; needs more 'I declare' and 'He promises'.

specifieke_suggesties.voorgestelde_revisie: Graduates, Christ died for you, the ungodly.
specifieke_suggesties.verschil: Shifts from a general truth (Assertive) to a personal address (Declarative).

toezegging_versterking.probleem: The promise is often buried in book summaries.
toezegging_versterking.suggestie: Use the 'I' of the preacher to deliver the 'He' of the Gospel.
voorbeeldzinnen: I announce to you today: your righteousness is not your own, but Christ's.

adressering_verbetering.suggestie: Bring the 'unspiritual' people mentioned directly into the room's address.
voorbeeldzinnen: You will sit with the unspiritual, and to them, you will say...

indicatief_imperatief_herstel.probleem: The balance is actually quite good.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A theologically profound sermon that successfully avoids the trap of moralism, though it flirts with the trap of the lecture. The ending redeems the constative surplus with a powerful performative charge.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_schulz_von_thun: Unlike SvT, this analysis ignores the preacher's 'self-revelation' and focuses on the 'Creative Word' (Declarative) as the source of authority.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retoriek: The focus is not on the 'pathos' of the civil rights stories, but on the 'illocutionary force' of the gospel promise within those stories.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_SAT: SAT reveals that the sermon's power is not in the 'Golden Rule' (Directive) but in the 'Word of Faith' (Commissive/Declarative).

kernzinnen_analyse.zin: Christ is the end of the law.
The dispatch from the Commander passes now to you.

appendices.notities: The sermon is a transition pieceâ€”moving from the 'talking about' of the academy to the 'doing' of the ministry.
